page.title: 14Colden Common in the Future
page.content: A sample survey carried out in the village revealed that 66% of the interviewees had moved into the village in the past 10 years and this has led to an inevitable gap in outlook between the"old" and "new" village.Some of the older residents expressed concern that their village had lost some of its identity and regretted the disappearance of the countryside of their youth.Both"old" and"new"villagers are,however,united in their concern over the recently published"Village Development Plan" which envisages the building of another 230 houses in the village. The younger people of the village hope that the developemnts will bring new amenities whilst the local traders welcome the potential additional custom.
